napi.data.files¶

Model classes to represent data files.

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Config

Representation of the collection of configuration files.

File

Generic file representation.
class napi.data.files.Config¶

Representation of the collection of configuration files.

get_config()¶

Return config as a dictionary.

If there are multiple config files, then retrieve based on name. Else, return the file in provided path.

class napi.data.files.File¶

Generic file representation.
